text: Some fun facts about Christopher Lee Christopher Lee is best known for his role as Count Dooku in Star Wars  but he has some interesting things about him that I would like to share   He was related to Charlemagne  King of the Franks   He was related  step cousin  to Ian Fleming  the creator of James Bond   Ian actually had Chris as a possible cast member for James Bond   He was related to Confederate General Robert E  Lee   Christopher Lee was a soldier in WW  who served in the predecessor of the Special Air Service  SAS  Anyone getting MW flashbacks   Christopher made metal albums in the early  s  Lol   Christopher actually met Rasputin s killers when he was young   He entered the Guinness Book of a World Records for having the most screen credits   films and TV movies When he was   he witnessed the last person in French history to be executed by guillotine   He climbed Mount Vesuvius   days before it s last eruption in    He was the only cast member of the LOTR franchise to actually meet J R  Tolkien  the writer of the Hobbit and LOTR books   Chris spoke   languages   If I remember correctly  his ancestors created the first successful opera house in Australia  I could be wrong though   He was the oldest musician to hit Billboard Charts   There is only one word to describe Christopher Lee   Badass
summary: Christopher Lee played Count Dooku in Star Wars. He is related to Charlemagne King of the Franks, Ian Fleming and Confederate General Robert E Lee. He was a soldier in WW and served in the predecessor of the Special Air Service SAS. He entered the Guinness Book of a World Records for having the most screen credits films and TV movies. He witnessed the last person in French history to be executed by guillotine. He climbed Mount Vesuvius days before it's last eruption. His ancestors created the first successful opera house in Australia.
